info.title: PostgreSQLManagementClient
info.description: The Azure Database for PostgreSQL management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure PostgreSQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules, network configuration, security alert policies, log files and configurations with new business model.

post.description: Gets the private DNS zone suffix.

get.description: Lists all available REST API operations.

post.description: Checks the validity and availability of the given name, to assign it to a new server or to use it as the base name of a new pair of virtual endpoints.

get.description: Lists all servers in a subscription.
Lists the capabilities available in a given location for a specific subscription.

post.description: Check the availability of name for resource
Lists the virtual network subnet usage for a given virtual network.

get.description: Get quota usages at specified location in a given subscription.
Lists all servers in a resource group.
Gets information about an existing server.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

patch.description: Updates an existing server. The request body can contain one or multiple of the properties present in the normal server definition.

put.description: Creates a new server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

put.description: Creates or updates a server's Advanced Threat Protection settings.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Gets information of an on demand backup, given its name.

put.description: Creates an on demand backup of a server.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

delete.description: Deletes a specific backup, given its name.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.summary: Check the validity and availability of the given name, to assign it to a new migration.
post.description: Checks if a proposed migration name is valid and available.

get.description: Lists all configurations (also known as server parameters) of a server.
Gets information about a specific configuration (also known as server parameter) of a server.

put.description: Updates, using Put verb, the value assigned to a specific modifiable configuration (also known as server parameter) of a server.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

patch.description: Updates the value assigned to a specific modifiable configuration (also known as server parameter) of a server.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

x-ms-request-id.description: A unique ID for the current operation, service generated. All the resource providers must return this value in the response headers to facilitate debugging.

x-ms-error-code.description: ErrorCode string in the event of a failure.

x-ms-request-id.description: A unique ID for the current operation, service generated. All the resource providers must return this value in the response headers to facilitate debugging.

get.description: Lists all migrations of a target flexible server.
Gets information about a migration.

patch.description: Updates an existing migration. The request body can contain one to many of the mutable properties present in the migration definition. Certain property updates initiate migration state transitions.

get.description: Lists all private endpoint connections on a server.
Gets a private endpoint connection.

put.description: Approves or rejects a private endpoint connection.

AdminCredentials.description: Credentials of administrator users for source and target servers.

sourceServerPassword.description: Password for the user of the source server.

targetServerPassword.description: Password for the user of the target server.

AdminCredentialsForPatch.description: Credentials of administrator users for source and target servers.

sourceServerPassword.description: Password for the user of the source server.

targetServerPassword.description: Password for the user of the target server.

AdministratorMicrosoftEntra.description: Server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

properties.description: Properties of a server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

AdministratorMicrosoftEntraAdd.description: Server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

properties.description: Properties of the server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

AdministratorMicrosoftEntraProperties.description: Properties of a server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

principalType.description: Type of Microsoft Entra principal to which the server administrator is associated.

principalName.description: Name of the Microsoft Entra principal.

objectId.description: Object identifier of the Microsoft Entra principal.

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant in which the Microsoft Entra principal exists.

AdministratorMicrosoftEntraPropertiesFor.description: Properties of a server administrator associated to a Microsoft Entra principal.

principalType.description: Type of Microsoft Entra principal to which the server administrator is associated.

principalName.description: Name of the Microsoft Entra principal.

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant in which the Microsoft Entra principal exists.

AdvancedThreatProtectionSettingsModel.description: Advanced threat protection settings of the server.

AdvancedThreatProtectionSettingsProperti.description: Properties of advanced threat protection state for a server.

state.description: Specifies the state of the advanced threat protection, whether it is enabled, disabled, or a state has not been applied yet on the server.

creationTime.description: Specifies the creation time (UTC) of the policy.

AuthConfig.description: Authentication configuration properties of a server.

activeDirectoryAuth.description: Indicates if the server supports Microsoft Entra authentication.

passwordAuth.description: Indicates if the server supports password based authentication.

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant of the delegated resource.

AuthConfigForPatch.description: Authentication configuration properties of a server.

activeDirectoryAuth.description: Indicates if the server supports Microsoft Entra authentication.

passwordAuth.description: Indicates if the server supports password based authentication.

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant of the delegated resource.

backupRetentionDays.description: Backup retention days for the server.

geoRedundantBackup.description: Indicates if the server is configured to create geographically redundant backups.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for a server.

completedTime.description: Time(ISO8601 format) at which the backup was completed.

backupRetentionDays.description: Backup retention days for the server.

geoRedundantBackup.description: Indicates if the server is configured to create geographically redundant backups.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for a server.

BackupRequestBase.description: BackupRequestBase is the base for all backup request.

BackupSettings.description: The settings for the long term backup.

backupName.description: Backup Name for the current backup

BackupStoreDetails.description: Details about the target where the backup content will be stored.

sasUriList.description: List of SAS uri of storage containers where backup data is to be streamed/copied.

BackupsLongTermRetentionOperation.description: Response for the LTR backup Operation API call

properties.description: Long Term Retention Backup Operation Resource Properties

BackupsLongTermRetentionRequest.description: The request that is made for a long term retention backup.

targetDetails.description: Backup store detail for target server

BackupsLongTermRetentionResponse.description: Response for the LTR backup API call

properties.description: Long Term Retention Backup Operation Resource Properties

numberOfContainers.description: Number of storage containers the plugin will use during backup. More than one containers may be used for size limitations, parallelism, or redundancy etc.

Capability.description: Capability for the Azure Database for PostgreSQL flexible server.

supportedServerVersions.description: List of supported major versions of PostgreSQL database engine.

fastProvisioningSupported.description: Indicates if fast provisioning is supported. 'Enabled' means fast provisioning is supported. 'Disabled' stands for fast provisioning is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'FastProvisioning'.

supportedFastProvisioningEditions.description: List of compute tiers supporting fast provisioning.

geoBackupSupported.description: Indicates if geographically redundant backups are supported in this location. 'Enabled' means geographically redundant backups are supported. 'Disabled' stands for geographically redundant backup is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'GeoBackup'.

zoneRedundantHaSupported.description: Indicates if high availability with zone redundancy is supported in this location. 'Enabled' means high availability with zone redundancy is supported. 'Disabled' stands for high availability with zone redundancy is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for  'ZoneRedundantHa'.

zoneRedundantHaAndGeoBackupSupported.description: Indicates if high availability with zone redundancy is supported in conjunction with geographically redundant backups in this location. 'Enabled' means high availability with zone redundancy is supported in conjunction with geographically redundant backups is supported. 'Disabled' stands for high availability with zone redundancy is supported in conjunction with geographically redundant backups is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'ZoneRedundantHaAndGeoBackup'.

storageAutoGrowthSupported.description: Indicates if storage autogrow is supported in this location. 'Enabled' means storage autogrow is supported. 'Disabled' stands for storage autogrow is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'StorageAutoGrowth'.

onlineResizeSupported.description: Indicates if resizing the storage, without interrupting the operation of the database engine, is supported in this location for the given subscription. 'Enabled' means resizing the storage without interrupting the operation of the database engine is supported. 'Disabled' means resizing the storage without interrupting the operation of the database engine is not supported. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'OnlineResize'.

restricted.description: Indicates if this location is restricted. 'Enabled' means location is restricted. 'Disabled' stands for location is not restricted. Will be deprecated in the future. Look to Supported Features for 'Restricted'.

reason.description: The reason for the capability not being available.

createdTime.description: Creation timestamp of the log file.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modified timestamp of the log file.

sizeInKb.description: Size (in KB) of the log file.

type.description: Type of log file. Can be 'ServerLogs' or 'UpgradeLogs'.

url.description: URL to download the log file from.

clusterSize.description: Number of nodes assigned to the elastic cluster.

defaultDatabaseName.description: Default database name for the elastic cluster.

properties.description: Properties of a configuration (also known as server parameter).
Properties of a configuration (also known as server parameter).

ConfigurationProperties.description: Properties of a configuration (also known as server parameter).

value.description: Value of the configuration (also known as server parameter). Required to update the value assigned to a specific modifiable configuration.

description.description: Description of the configuration (also known as server parameter).

defaultValue.description: Value assigned by default to the configuration (also known as server parameter).

dataType.description: Data type of the configuration (also known as server parameter).

allowedValues.description: Allowed values of the configuration (also known as server parameter).

source.description: Source of the value assigned to the configuration (also known as server parameter). Required to update the value assigned to a specific modifiable configuration.

isDynamicConfig.description: Indicates if it's a dynamic (true) or static (false) configuration (also known as server parameter). Static server parameters require a server restart after changing the value assigned to them, for the change to take effect. Dynamic server parameters do not require a server restart after changing the value assigned to them, for the change to take effect.

isReadOnly.description: Indicates if it's a read-only (true) or modifiable (false) configuration (also known as server parameter).

isConfigPendingRestart.description: Indicates if the value assigned to the configuration (also known as server parameter) is pending a server restart for it to take effect.

unit.description: Units in which the configuration (also known as server parameter) value is expressed.

documentationLink.description: Link pointing to the documentation of the configuration (also known as server parameter).

DataEncryption.description: Data encryption properties of a server.

primaryKeyURI.description: URI of the key in Azure Key Vault used for data encryption of the primary storage associated to a server.

primaryUserAssignedIdentityId.description: Identifier of the user assigned managed identity used to access the key in Azure Key Vault for data encryption of the primary storage associated to a server.

geoBackupKeyURI.description: Identifier of the user assigned managed identity used to access the key in Azure Key Vault for data encryption of the geographically redundant storage associated to a server that is configured to support geographically redundant backups.

geoBackupUserAssignedIdentityId.description: Identifier of the user assigned managed identity used to access the key in Azure Key Vault for data encryption of the geographically redundant storage associated to a server that is configured to support geographically redundant backups.

type.description: Data encryption type used by a server.

primaryEncryptionKeyStatus.description: Status of key used by a server configured with data encryption based on customer managed key, to encrypt the primary storage associated to the server.

geoBackupEncryptionKeyStatus.description: Status of key used by a server configured with data encryption based on customer managed key, to encrypt the primary storage associated to the server.

startedOn.description: Start time of a migration state.

endedOn.description: End time of a migration state.

fullLoadQueuedTables.description: Number of tables queued for the migration of a database.

fullLoadErroredTables.description: Number of tables encountering errors during the migration of a database.

fullLoadLoadingTables.description: Number of tables loading during the migration of a database.

fullLoadCompletedTables.description: Number of tables loaded during the migration of a database.

appliedChanges.description: Change Data Capture applied changes counter.

incomingChanges.description: Change Data Capture incoming changes counter.

latency.description: Lag in seconds between source and target during online phase.

message.description: Error message, if any, for the migration state.

DbLevelValidationStatus.description: Validation status summary for a database.

startedOn.description: Start time of a database level validation.

endedOn.description: End time of a database level validation.

version.description: Major version of PostgreSQL database engine.

storageMb.description: Storage size (in MB) for database server.

sku.description: Compute tier and size of the database server. This object is empty for an Azure Database for PostgreSQL single server.

subnetName.description: Name of the delegated subnet for which IP addresses are in use

usage.description: Number of IP addresses used by the delegated subnet

FastProvisioningEditionCapability.description: Capability of a fast provisioning compute tier.

supportedStorageGb.description: Storage size (in GB) supporting fast provisioning.

supportedServerVersions.description: Major version of PostgreSQL database engine supporting fast provisioning.

serverCount.description: Count of servers in cache matching this specification.

startIpAddress.description: IP address defining the start of the range of addresses of a firewall rule. Must be expressed in IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: IP address defining the end of the range of addresses of a firewall rule. Must be expressed in IPv4 format.

HighAvailability.description: High availability properties of a server.

mode.description: High availability mode for a server.

state.description: Possible states of the standby server created when high availability is set to SameZone or ZoneRedundant.

standbyAvailabilityZone.description: Availability zone associated to the standby server created when high availability is set to SameZone or ZoneRedundant.

HighAvailabilityForPatch.description: High availability properties of a server.

mode.description: Modes of high availability supported for this compute.

state.description: Possible states of the standby server created when high availability is set to SameZone or ZoneRedundant.

standbyAvailabilityZone.description: Availability zone associated to the standby server created when high availability is set to SameZone or ZoneRedundant.

ImpactRecord.description: Impact on some metric if this recommended action is applied.

queryId.description: Optional property that can be used to store the identifier of the query, if the metric is for a specific query.

backupMetadata.description: Metadata to be stored in RP. Store everything that will be required to perform a successful restore using this Recovery point. e.g. Versions, DataFormat etc

status.description: Service-set extensible enum indicating the status of operation

LtrPreBackupRequest.description: A request that is made for pre-backup.

LtrPreBackupResponse.description: Response for the LTR pre-backup API call

properties.description: Additional Properties for the pre backup response

MaintenanceWindow.description: Maintenance window properties of a server.

customWindow.description: Indicates whether custom window is enabled or disabled.

startHour.description: Start hour to be used for maintenance window.

startMinute.description: Start minute to be used for maintenance window.

dayOfWeek.description: Day of the week to be used for maintenance window.

MaintenanceWindowForPatch.description: Maintenance window properties of a server.

customWindow.description: Indicates whether custom window is enabled or disabled.

startHour.description: Start hour to be used for maintenance window.

startMinute.description: Start minute to be used for maintenance window.

dayOfWeek.description: Day of the week to be used for maintenance window.

name.description: Name of the migration to check for validity and availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates if the migration name is available.

migrationInstanceResourceId.description: Identifier of the private endpoint migration instance.

migrationMode.description: Mode used to perform the migration: Online or Offline.

sourceType.description: Source server type used for the migration: ApsaraDB_RDS, AWS, AWS_AURORA, AWS_EC2, AWS_RDS, AzureVM, Crunchy_PostgreSQL, Digital_Ocean_Droplets, Digital_Ocean_PostgreSQL, EDB, EDB_Oracle_Server, EDB_PostgreSQL, GCP, GCP_AlloyDB, GCP_CloudSQL, GCP_Compute, Heroku_PostgreSQL, Huawei_Compute, Huawei_RDS, OnPremises, PostgreSQLCosmosDB, PostgreSQLFlexibleServer, PostgreSQLSingleServer, or Supabase_PostgreSQL

sslMode.description: SSL mode used by a migration. Default SSL mode for 'PostgreSQLSingleServer' is 'VerifyFull'. Default SSL mode for other source types is 'Prefer'.

sourceDbServerResourceId.description: Identifier of the source database server resource, when 'sourceType' is 'PostgreSQLSingleServer'. For other source types this must be set to ipaddress:port@username or hostname:port@username.

sourceDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the source server. This property is optional. When provided, the migration service will always use it to connect to the source server.

targetDbServerResourceId.description: Identifier of the target database server resource.

targetDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the target server. This property is optional. When provided, the migration service will always use it to connect to the target server.

setupLogicalReplicationOnSourceDbIfNeede.description: Indicates whether to setup logical replication on source server, if needed.

overwriteDbsInTarget.description: Indicates if databases on the target server can be overwritten when already present. If set to 'False', when the migration workflow detects that the database already exists on the target server, it will wait for a confirmation.

migrateRoles.description: Indicates if roles and permissions must be migrated.

startDataMigration.description: Indicates if data migration must start right away.

triggerCutover.description: Indicates if cutover must be triggered for the entire migration.

dbsToTriggerCutoverOn.description: When you want to trigger cutover for specific databases set 'triggerCutover' to 'True' and the names of the specific databases in this array.

cancel.description: Indicates if cancel must be triggered for the entire migration.

dbsToCancelMigrationOn.description: When you want to trigger cancel for specific databases set 'triggerCutover' to 'True' and the names of the specific databases in this array.

sourceDbServerResourceId.description: Identifier of the source database server resource, when 'sourceType' is 'PostgreSQLSingleServer'. For other source types this must be set to ipaddress:port@username or hostname:port@username.

sourceDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the source server. This property is optional. When provided, the migration service will always use it to connect to the source server.

targetDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the target server. This property is optional. When provided, the migration service will always use it to connect to the target server.

setupLogicalReplicationOnSourceDbIfNeede.description: Indicates whether to setup logical replication on source server, if needed.

overwriteDbsInTarget.description: Indicates if databases on the target server can be overwritten when already present. If set to 'False', when the migration workflow detects that the database already exists on the target server, it will wait for a confirmation.

migrateRoles.description: Indicates if roles and permissions must be migrated.

startDataMigration.description: Indicates if data migration must start right away.

triggerCutover.description: Indicates if cutover must be triggered for the entire migration.

dbsToTriggerCutoverOn.description: When you want to trigger cutover for specific databases set 'triggerCutover' to 'True' and the names of the specific databases in this array.

cancel.description: Indicates if cancel must be triggered for the entire migration.

dbsToCancelMigrationOn.description: When you want to trigger cancel for specific databases set 'triggerCutover' to 'True' and the names of the specific databases in this array.

migrationMode.description: Mode used to perform the migration: Online or Offline.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

adminCredentials.description: Credentials of administrator users for source and target servers.

sourceServerUsername.description: Gets or sets the name of the user for the source server. This user doesn't need to be an administrator.

targetServerUsername.description: Gets or sets the name of the user for the target server. This user doesn't need to be an administrator.

adminCredentials.description: Credentials of administrator users for source and target servers.

sourceServerUsername.description: Gets or sets the name of the user for the source server. This user doesn't need to be an administrator.

targetServerUsername.description: Gets or sets the name of the user for the target server. This user doesn't need to be an administrator.

error.description: Error message, if any, for the migration state.

name.description: Name for which validity and availability was checked.

type.description: Type of resource. It can be 'Microsoft.DBforPostgreSQL/flexibleServers' or 'Microsoft.DBforPostgreSQL/flexibleServers/virtualendpoints'.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Indicates if public network access is enabled or not.

delegatedSubnetResourceId.description: Resource identifier of the delegated subnet. Required during creation of a new server, in case you want the server to be integrated into your own virtual network. For an update operation, you only have to provide this property if you want to change the value assigned for the private DNS zone.

privateDnsZoneArmResourceId.description: Identifier of the private DNS zone. Required during creation of a new server, in case you want the server to be integrated into your own virtual network. For an update operation, you only have to provide this property if you want to change the value assigned for the private DNS zone.

ObjectRecommendationDetails.description: Recommendation details for the recommended action.

lastRecommendedTime.description: Last time (UTC) that this recommendation was produced.

timesRecommended.description: Number of times this recommendation has been produced.

improvedQueryIds.description: List of identifiers for all queries identified as targets for improvement if the recommendation is applied. The list is only populated for CREATE INDEX recommendations.

implementationDetails.description: Implementation details for the recommended action.

analyzedWorkload.description: Workload information for the recommended action.

estimatedImpact.description: Estimated impact of this recommended action.

details.description: Recommendation details for the recommended action.

ObjectRecommendationPropertiesAnalyzedWo.description: Workload information for the recommended action.

startTime.description: Start time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

endTime.description: End time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

queryCount.description: Number of queries from the workload that were examined to produce this recommendation. For DROP INDEX recommendations it's 0 (zero).

ObjectRecommendationPropertiesImplementa.description: Implementation details for the recommended action.

method.description: Method of implementation for recommended action.

script.description: Implementation script for the recommended action.

name.description: Name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation or action.

isDataAction.description: Indicates if the operation is a data action.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

resource.description: Type of resource on which the operation is performed.

name.description: Name of quota usage for servers

role.description: Role of the server in a replication set.

capacity.description: Maximum number of read replicas allowed for a server.

replicationState.description: Indicates the replication state of a read replica. This property is returned only when the target server is a read replica. Possible  values are Active, Broken, Catchup, Provisioning, Reconfiguring, and Updating

promoteMode.description: Type of operation to apply on the read replica. This property is write only. Standalone means that the read replica will be promoted to a standalone server, and will become a completely independent entity from the replication set. Switchover means that the read replica will roles with the primary server.

promoteOption.description: Data synchronization option to use when processing the operation specified in the promoteMode property. This property is write only.

restartWithFailover.description: Indicates if restart the PostgreSQL database engine should failover or switch over from primary to standby. This only works if server has high availability enabled.

sku.description: Compute tier and size of a server.

identity.description: User assigned managed identities assigned to the server.

ServerEditionCapability.description: Capabilities in terms of compute tier.

defaultSkuName.description: Default compute name (SKU) for this computer tier.

supportedStorageEditions.description: List of storage editions supported by this compute tier and compute name.

ServerForPatch.description: Represents a server to be updated.

sku.description: Compute tier and size of a server.

identity.description: Describes the identity of the application.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

administratorLogin.description: Name of the login designated as the first password based administrator assigned to your instance of PostgreSQL. Must be specified the first time that you enable password based authentication on a server. Once set to a given value, it cannot be changed for the rest of the life of a server. If you disable password based authentication on a server which had it enabled, this password based role isn't deleted.

administratorLoginPassword.description: Password assigned to the administrator login. As long as password authentication is enabled, this password can be changed at any time.

version.description: Major version of PostgreSQL database engine.

minorVersion.description: Minor version of PostgreSQL database engine.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name of a server.

authConfig.description: Authentication configuration properties of a server.

dataEncryption.description: Data encryption properties of a server.

network.description: Network properties of a server. Only required if you want your server to be integrated into a virtual network provided by customer.

highAvailability.description: High availability properties of a server.

maintenanceWindow.description: Maintenance window properties of a server.

sourceServerResourceId.description: Identifier of the server to be used as the source of the new server. Required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore', 'GeoRestore', 'Replica', or 'ReviveDropped'. This property is returned only when the target server is a read replica.

pointInTimeUTC.description: Creation time (in ISO8601 format) of the backup which you want to restore in the new server. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore', 'GeoRestore', or 'ReviveDropped'.

replicationRole.description: Role of the server in a replication set.

replicaCapacity.description: Maximum number of read replicas allowed for a server.

replica.description: Read replica properties of a server. Required only in case that you want to promote a server.

createMode.description: Creation mode of a new server.

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the specified server.

administratorLogin.description: Name of the login designated as the first password based administrator assigned to your instance of PostgreSQL. Must be specified the first time that you enable password based authentication on a server. Once set to a given value, it cannot be changed for the rest of the life of a server. If you disable password based authentication on a server which had it enabled, this password based role isn't deleted.

administratorLoginPassword.description: Password assigned to the administrator login. As long as password authentication is enabled, this password can be changed at any time.

version.description: Major version of PostgreSQL database engine.

highAvailability.description: High availability properties of a server.

maintenanceWindow.description: Maintenance window properties of a server.

authConfig.description: Authentication configuration properties of a server.

dataEncryption.description: Data encryption properties of a server.

createMode.description: Update mode of an existing server.

replicationRole.description: Role of the server in a replication set.

replica.description: Read replica properties of a server. Required only in case that you want to promote a server.

network.description: Network properties of a server. Only required if you want your server to be integrated into a virtual network provided by customer.

name.description: Compute tier and size of the database server. This object is empty for an Azure Database for PostgreSQL single server.

tier.description: Tier of the compute assigned to a server.

supportedIops.description: Maximum IOPS supported by this compute.

supportedMemoryPerVcoreMb.description: Supported memory (in MB) per virtual core assigned to this compute.

supportedZones.description: List of supported availability zones. E.g. '1', '2', '3'

supportedHaMode.description: Modes of high availability supported for this compute.

items.description: Modes of high availability supported for this compute.

securityProfile.description: Security profile of the compute. Indicates if it's a Confidential Compute virtual machine.

ServerVersionCapability.description: Capabilities in terms of major versions of PostgreSQL database engine.

name.description: Major version of PostgreSQL database engine.

supportedVersionsToUpgrade.description: Major versions of PostgreSQL database engine to which this version can be automatically upgraded.

name.description: Name by which is known a given compute size assigned to a server.

tier.description: Tier of the compute assigned to a server.

name.description: Name by which is known a given compute size assigned to a server.

tier.description: Tier of the compute assigned to a server.

storageSizeGB.description: Size of storage assigned to a server.

autoGrow.description: Flag to enable or disable the automatic growth of storage size of a server when available space is nearing zero and conditions allow for automatically growing storage size.

iops.description: Maximum IOPS supported for storage. Required when type of storage is PremiumV2_LRS or UltraSSD_LRS.

throughput.description: Maximum throughput supported for storage. Required when type of storage is PremiumV2_LRS or UltraSSD_LRS.

type.description: Type of storage assigned to a server. Allowed values are Premium_LRS, PremiumV2_LRS, or UltraSSD_LRS. If not specified, it defaults to Premium_LRS.

StorageEditionCapability.description: Capabilities in terms of storage tier.

defaultStorageSizeMb.description: Default storage size (in MB) for this storage tier.

supportedStorageMb.description: Configurations of storage supported for this storage tier.

supportedIops.description: Minimum IOPS supported by the storage size.

supportedMaximumIops.description: Maximum IOPS supported by the storage size.

storageSizeMb.description: Minimum supported size (in MB) of storage.

maximumStorageSizeMb.description: Maximum supported size (in MB) of storage.

supportedThroughput.description: Minimum supported throughput (in MB/s) of storage.

supportedMaximumThroughput.description: Maximum supported throughput (in MB/s) of storage.

defaultIopsTier.description: Default IOPS for this tier and storage size.

supportedIopsTiers.description: List of all supported storage tiers for this tier and storage size.

iops.description: Supported IOPS for the storage tier.

status.description: Status of the feature. Indicates if the feature is enabled or not.

TuningOptions.description: Impact on some metric if this recommended action is applied.

userAssignedIdentities.description: Map of user assigned managed identities.

principalId.description: Identifier of the object of the service principal associated to the user assigned managed identity.

type.description: Types of identities associated with a server.

tenantId.description: Identifier of the tenant of a server.

UserIdentity.description: User assigned managed identity associated with a server.

principalId.description: Identifier of the object of the service principal associated to the user assigned managed identity.

clientId.description: Identifier of the client of the service principal associated to the user assigned managed identity.

ValidationDetails.description: Details for the validation for migration.

VirtualEndpoint.description: Pair of virtual endpoints for a server.

properties.description: Properties of the pair of virtual endpoints.

VirtualEndpointResourceForPatch.description: Pair of virtual endpoints for a server.

properties.description: Properties of the pair of virtual endpoints.

VirtualEndpointResourceProperties.description: Properties of a pair of virtual endpoints.

endpointType.description: Type of endpoint for the virtual endpoints.

members.description: List of servers that one of the virtual endpoints can refer to.

virtualEndpoints.description: List of virtual endpoints for a server.

location.description: location of the delegated subnet usage

subscriptionId.description: subscriptionId of the delegated subnet usage
